ing: 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger chilled lemon-lime soda
des: "This is a vodka martini with a summer twist!"
ins: Pour the vodka, schnapps, lemonade, and soda into a cocktail shaker over ice. Cover, and shake until the outside of the shaker has frosted. Strain into a chilled martini glass, and garnish with a lime wedge and maraschino cherry to serve.
